author: Luis A. Cruz
subject: Re: That's it. I'm leaving.
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

I'll preface my response with this; I hope that this is
a little reverse psychology to get us all to post a bit
more. :)

> I've had it. Lupin stuff is too rare, and I don't like the
> approach these other films take (anything past "Fuma Clan"), and
> this  

To each his own; some of the post-Fuma movies/specials are pretty
good.

> Maybe I'll fall for some other, more available anime... like Tenchi
> Muyo!, Pokemon, Project A-ko or Sailor Moon. I mean, is it really
> *worth* it to look so hard for all this merchandise and celluloid? 
>  

IMO, you should fall for Tenchi Muyo and Project A-ko (at least the
first
film) anyway. :)  Both are good shows; never been able to get into
Pokemon
or Sailor Moon myself.  As for the merchandise, it is becoming more
and more
available on ebay each day.  The celluloid will set you back though;
you can
find places that sell the raw Japanese tapes, but they are wicked
expensive.

> Besides, I don't think anyone except Luis Cruz and Bruce Osborne
> (thanks guys) even listens to what I say on this barren ML (~4 days
> of silence.. on an anime-based list?!), because the only responses
> I get are... "that's your .sig quote? Dubs are evil." or a complete
> change of  

*sigh*  That's the peril of the net, having to deal with clueless
jerks.
As for this list being barren, maybe all of us Lupin lovers are
introverts. :)
I know that I lurk more than I post in all the MLs and newsgroups I
read.
Also, its hard to talk about a show that you can't watch too much;
with no
US company looking to purchase the rights, we can't even start the
rumor
mills in motion.  At best, we will get a subbed version of Cagliostro
by
the end of the year.

> And I had *so* much Lupin fan art to scan in...

I think that speaks volumes about why you should stick around; it's
this
kind of material that may generate more interest in this ML and with
the
anime community at large.  Just my thoughts.
